  • Global Variables

Note that gloabl variables are only available on the parsing layer they are defined:


<pbs:macro name="global-vars1" before> 
<pbs:!macro name="global-vars2" before"> 
<pbs:macro name="example1"> 
<pbs:!macro name="example2">
